column5: You will get a first overview about the main functionalities of the OTRS ticket system
column6: Basic idea of a ticket systems: a request form the customer to the company
column7:
You as the Agent
-create a new queue dedicated for the registration process wihtin the 'admin'
- be sure the 'webservice' user has access to the queue

You as the Customer
- visit the company's sign up page on firma.de/register.html>
- send a registration request

You as the Agent
- find the corresponding ticket
- create the requested user within the 'customer information center'
